g++   -g -O0  -ggdb -Wl,--no-as-needed -Wall -Wextra  --rtti  -fsanitize=address -fsanitize=undefined -fno-sanitize-recover=all -fsanitize=float-divide-by-zero -fsanitize=float-cast-overflow -fno-sanitize=null -fno-sanitize=alignment -g   CMakeFiles/m1.dir/src/m1/m1.cpp.o CMakeFiles/m1.dir/src/m1/device.cpp.o CMakeFiles/m1.dir/src/common/nvmeprint.cpp.o CMakeFiles/m1.dir/src/common/utils.cpp.o  -o bin/m1  -lnvme -lpthread
